name: Alfresco-ADF-Angular-Demo
description: Demo shell for Alfresco Angular components
author: Alfresco Software, Ltd.

scripts.start: npm run server-versions && rimraf dist && ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 --proxy-config proxy.conf.js --app dist --open
scripts.start:dev: npm run lint && npm run server-versions && rimraf dist && npm run clean-lib-angular && concurrently "ng serve --host 0.0.0.0 --disable-host-check --app dev --proxy-config proxy.conf.js --open" "npm run style:dev --watch" "npm run copy:dev"
scripts.start:dist: npm run server-versions && rimraf dist && node --max_old_space_size=30000 node_modules/.bin/ng serve --prod --host 0.0.0.0 --disable-host-check --app dist --proxy-config proxy.conf.js -open
scripts.build: npm run validate-config && npm run server-versions && rimraf dist && ng build --app dist
scripts.build:dev: npm run validate-config && npm run lint && npm run style:dev && npm run server-versions && rimraf dist && ng build --app dev
scripts.build:dist: npm run validate-config && npm run server-versions && rimraf dist && ng build --prod --app dist
